# Factorio Agent Report - Steps 0-23

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Steam Power Generation at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) to (x=0.5, y=6.5)
Generates electricity using steam power.
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) extracting water. *Status: WORKING*
- Boiler at (x=-5.0, y=2.5) consuming coal and water to produce steam. *Status: WORKING* (Refueled in steps 16 & 21)
- Steam Engine at (x=0.5
